bio: Sylphiron lives in the city of Markarth, where she works for a Nord woman named Lisbet at Arnleif Trading Sons and Company, a general goods store. Sylphiron and her master share similar ... tastes. Lisbet relies on Sylphiron to handle preparations regarding their secret mutual interests. Sylphiron and Lisbet are secretly both cannibals and worshipers of Namira, the Daedric Prince of darkness, hunger, and decay. Lisbet also employs Imedhnain at her business, but he doesn't know about Lisbet and Sylphiron's cannibalism or worship of Namira.
name: Sylphiron
